name: DLink | DGS3100 | Security | ACL | ACL Deny (SYSLOG)
description: %MNGINF-W-ACL: Management ACL drop packet received on interface Vlan 3 from 172.16.35.2 to 172.16.15.9 protocol 1 service Icmp
